TopicTitle: What other games in beside KSP you plan and what game you want play in future

Articles.Content: I'm waiting for SimCity in 2013
besides this, only metro: last light, which comes out next year, and borderlands 2. soon, my pretty, soon!!!!
Hrmmm... Rigs of Rods, orbiter 2010 and Minecraft.

flight simulator, orbiter ArmA2 DCS warthog.... to name a few

looking forward to ArmA3 and GTA5 -- both look mighty promising

Does KSP count? Just kidding xD

I don't really play much, but I guess Planetside 2 even though I'm in the beta. I'm just waiting for the full release so I can take it more seriously without all of these major changes.

And Minecraft, I guess.

KSP .17. Just saying.

However I just picked up Sleeping Dogs because I'm excited Squaresoft is finally doing something different than the repeated Final Fantasies. I'm hoping its pretty good. I only buy 4-5 games a year so this is a big deal for me.

Oh and I occasionally pick up minecraft and play around.
I play FTL and minecraft. BTD5 in and out. MCX360, I wanna get Planetary Annihilation.
Minecraft XBLA And Roblox (My laptop barely runs Roblox just if anyone's seen how I lag on KSP)

Games I'm playing now aside from KSP:

FTL, Spacechem, Rules of engagement 2, Minecraft.

Games I want to play:

Xcom, Enemy Unknown.
Ummm... I do play alot of games, but most of them are old (so my pc can run it good) so, nothing much. PA looks interesting tho.
I am waiting and getting money for primal carnage. PS: Don't but Orion: Dino beatdown, its a total scam with lame servers, tons of bugs and horrible AI

Games I'm playing now aside from KSP:

FTL, Spacechem, Rules of engagement 2, Minecraft.

Games I want to play:

Xcom, Enemy Unknown.

Almost exactly this. Well, except RoE2 and minecraft...

Preordered Xcom a few days ago.

MechWarrior Online. I've waited for this for so long. It's really shaping up to be pretty good.

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
I just get a addicted to one game at a time. Last was Skyrim. Before that Minecraft. Before that, Cortex Command.

Aside from GTA5 there is really only one game that has piqued my interest lately. It's called Kenshi, and it is shaping up to be a do whatever you want and live with the consequences sandboxy rpgish game.

FTL.

Day Z mod sometimes.

Games I'm looking forward to are X-Com Enemy Unknown, Obsidian's new kickstarter project, Castle Story, Planetary Annihilation...I guess that's about it.

Been playing Project Zomboid, but I don't recommend it at this time.

The game is still in development and the last update is so buggy, I feel it is unplayable for now.

It has potential though. I'm tempted by FTL, but I think it may be too fast paced for my liking.
i am playing tf2 and Black Mesa and is waiting for Hitman Absolution, The new Xcom and Borderlands 2, and then ofc HL3

It has potential though. I'm tempted by FTL, but I think it may be too fast paced for my liking.

The battles can get quite hectic sometimes with your crew running around trying to repel boarders, extinguish fires and repair the shields before the enemy ship fires and destroys your 1-hit-point-remaining ship all at the same time, but you can pause the game at any time and give orders so it never turns into a click fest.
That's good to know. I'll think about it.
Eve Online.
I can not wait to SimCity 2013, this is probably the best city-building simulator in the world :-)

X: Rebirth, when they decide to release it.

I was also looking forward to Subversion (put on indefinite hold) and STALKER 2 (cancelled and developer closed). Hopefully the same won't happen to Egosoft..

Of course Crysis 3!

Then Kerbal Space Program 0.17!
Well I want to pick Assassin's Creed III and Borderlands 2 but there's also Halo 4. Though it seems like I'm the only person on here talking about console games, oh well.
